metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37369 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through 6.5.x before6.5.2, there can be an application crash in QXmlStreamReader via a craftedXML string that triggers a situation in which a prefix is greater than alength.

criterions.comment: qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
